feed.title: Track Awesome Qr Code Updates Daily
feed.subtitle: A curated list of awesome QR code libraries, software and resources

entry.title: Awesome Qr Code Updates on Jun 13, 2024
entry.content:
Libraries / Ruby

  • rqrcode W (⭐1.9k) - A neat Ruby QR code generator exporting to svg, png and ansi with configurable size, color and other attributes.

entry.title: Awesome Qr Code Updates on Jul 14, 2022
entry.content:
CLI / File Transfer

  • qrscan (⭐177) - Scan a QR code in the terminal using the system camera or a given image.
  • qrcode.show - Generate QR codes using curl.

entry.title: Awesome Qr Code Updates on May 26, 2022
entry.content:
CLI / File Transfer

  • qrap (⭐7) - Generate a QR code payload for Wi-Fi access point credentials.
  • spqr (⭐2) - Generate a QR code payload for initiating a SEPA transfer.

entry.title: Awesome Qr Code Updates on Feb 24, 2021
entry.content:
Libraries / C

  • libqrencode W (⭐2.7k) - A fast and compact library for encoding data in a QR code symbol.

Libraries / C, C++, JavaScript, Python, Java, Rust

  • QR-Code-generator W (⭐5.9k) - High-quality QR code generator library in Java, TypeScript/JavaScript, Python, C++, C, Rust.

Libraries / Java

  • Qart W (⭐1.1k) - An app to merge a picture and a QR code.

Libraries / JavaScript

  • instascan R (⭐3k) - HTML5 QR code scanner using your webcam.
  • qrious W (⭐1.6k) - Pure JavaScript library for QR code generation using canvas.

Libraries / TypeScript

  • jsQR R (⭐3.9k) - A pure JavaScript QR code reading library.

Libraries / React

  • qrcode.react W (⭐4.1k) - A <QRCode/> component for use with React.

Libraries / React Native

  • react-native-qrcode-scanner R (⭐2k) - A QR code scanner component for React Native.

Libraries / Vue

  • vue-qrcode-reader R (⭐2.2k) - A set of Vue.js components for detecting and decoding QR codes.

Libraries / Python

  • sylnsfar/qrcode W (⭐11k) - Artistic QR code in Python (can produce GIFs).

Libraries / Objective-C

  • SGQRCode R (⭐1.7k) - Easy to use QR code scan library for iOS.

Libraries / Swift

  • EFQRCode W (⭐4.7k) - A better way to operate QR code in Swift, support iOS, macOS, watchOS and tvOS.

Libraries / C#

  • QRCoder W (⭐4.9k) - A pure C# Open Source QR code implementation.

Libraries / Android

  • BGAQRCode-Android RW (⭐8k) - QR code reader and generator written in C.
  • AwesomeQRCode (Kotlin) W (⭐1.9k) - An awesome QR code generator for Android (can produce GIFs).

Libraries / PHP

  • php-qrcode-detector-decoder R (⭐1.4k) - PHP library to detect and decode QR codes.
  • simple-qrcode W (⭐2.8k) - An easy-to-use PHP QR code generator.
  • endroid/qr-code W (⭐4.6k) - QR code generator.
  • BaconQRCode W (⭐2k) - QR code generator for PHP.

entry.title: Awesome Qr Code Updates on Sep 30, 2020
entry.content:
Apps / File Transfer

  • qr-filetransfer (⭐996) - Transfer files over Wi-Fi between your computer and your smartphone from the terminal.

entry.title: Awesome Qr Code Updates on Sep 29, 2020
entry.content:
Apps / Readers

  • Web App (⭐1.1k) - A progressive web application to scan QR codes.

Apps / File Transfer

  • qrcp (⭐10k) - Transfer files over Wi-Fi from your computer to a mobile device by scanning a QR code without leaving the terminal.

CLI / File Transfer

  • qrencode - Command line tool to generate QR codes.

Resources / PHP

  • zxing (⭐33k) - QR code payload format catalog.
